title: Why do i feel like ARAM it's not totally random.
body:
I always get the feeling that ARAM is not random at all because i only get a certain bunch of champions , like 32 or something like that.
my more often champs are :
soraka , tryndamere , ashe and renekton, 
It's really annoying to get the same champions and it makes it boring.

replies.body:
It's not random, in regards to what champ you get, the pool includes:

-All available champs owned by the team
-Free week champs

and individually, you can trade between the team, and reroll 2x for better champs. The results are absurd-- in any game, like, half the champs will be A or S tier for the map, and in my experience, concentrated heavily on one team.

God forbid you do well on a champ you don't own though, any rewards earned through the loot system will not be eligible because you should've bought RP and bought the champ, you rancid free-loading piece of shit.

Disregard that we called it the "mastery" system and not the "own-the-champ" system, but I digress.

It's not completely random, it's random from your available pool of champions. If you don't own any champions, you'll only have the free rotation champions to work with. In the next couple of patches, they're extending this to the previous free rotation as well as the current one.

I honestly forget that free rotation is a thing anymore since I own all champs.
It is not even remotely random. It heavily favors champions you are good at and seems to put some minor effort into varied comps.
